item.description:
Drop and shop samples

Is your interior design library crammed with outdated samples? Keep useful materials out of the trash bin by dropping off your samples at the Boston Design Center pedestrian platform on May 8 through 10.

The Boston Sample Drop | Shop event offers "drop" times to architectural firms and "shop" times to teachers, artists and others in need of free project materials.

Enjoy a great BBQ on Saturday, May 10 at noon. Free food, free drinks, free samples and it's good for our environment. What more could you ask for?

For specific drop and shop times or for more information, visit http://www.greengoat..... If you have any questions or want to volunteer, contact Jenna Beltram at jenna.beltram@burthill.com.
item.why: It's green, it's fun and it's free!
item.name: Boston Sample Drop | Shop
